hwVoiceIfMIB.name: hwVoiceIfMIB
hwVoiceIfMIB.contactinfo: PLAT Team Huawei 3Com Technologies co.,Ltd. Shang-Di Information Industry Base, Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.huawei-3com.com Zip:100085

hwVoIfConfigTable.name: hwVoIfConfigTable
hwVoIfConfigTable.description: The voice interface general configuration table contains information about configuration parameters for both analog voice interface and digital voice interface.

hwVoIfConfigEntry.name: hwVoIfConfigEntry
hwVoIfConfigEntry.description: An entry in the voice interface general configuration table. The entry is automatically created when a voice interface hardware is found.

hwVoIfConfigPortNumber.name: hwVoIfConfigPortNumber
hwVoIfConfigPortNumber.description: Index of voice interface general config table. It identify the number of the voice port.

hwVoIfConfigGroupNumber.name: hwVoIfConfigGroupNumber
hwVoIfConfigGroupNumber.description: Index of voice interface general config table. It identify the number of the ds0 or pri group. If it is used in an analog interface, the value is 255.

hwVoIfConfigCngOn.name: hwVoIfConfigCngOn
hwVoIfConfigCngOn.description: This object expresses whether or not the silence gaps should be filled with background noise. The default value is enable.

hwVoIfConfigNonLinearProcessSwitch.name: hwVoIfConfigNonLinearProcessSwitch
hwVoIfConfigNonLinearProcessSwitch.description: This object expresses the nonlinear processing is enable or disable for the voice interface. The default value is enable.

hwVoIfConfigMusicThreshold.name: hwVoIfConfigMusicThreshold
hwVoIfConfigMusicThreshold.description: This object states the music threshold of the voice interface. The default value is -38 dBm.

hwVoIfConfigInputGain.name: hwVoIfConfigInputGain
hwVoIfConfigInputGain.description: This object states the amount of gain added to the receive side of the voice interface. The default value is 0 decibel.

hwVoIfConfigOutputGain.name: hwVoIfConfigOutputGain
hwVoIfConfigOutputGain.description: This object states the amount of gain added to the send side of the voice interface. The default value is 0 decibel.

hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationSwitch.name: hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationSwitch
hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationSwitch.description: This object expresses the echo cancellation is enable or disable for the voice interface. The default value is enable.

hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationCoverage.name: hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationCoverage
hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationCoverage.description: This object states the milliseconds of echo cancellation coverage for the voice interface. This object can only be used when hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationSwitch is enable. The default value is echoCancelCoverage16ms.

hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationDelay.name: hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationDelay
hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationDelay.description: This object states the delay of the echo cancellation for the voice interface. This object can only be used when hwVoIfConfigEchoCancellationSwitch is enable. The default value is 32 milliseconds.

hwVoIfConfigPlarNumber.name: hwVoIfConfigPlarNumber
hwVoIfConfigPlarNumber.description: This object states the E.164 phone number for connection plar mode.

hwVoIfConfigRegionalTone.name: hwVoIfConfigRegionalTone
hwVoIfConfigRegionalTone.description: This object uses 2 letter country code specify voice parameters of different countrys.

hwVoIfConfigDescription.name: hwVoIfConfigDescription
hwVoIfConfigDescription.description: This object contains the description of voice interface

hwVoIfConfigStatus.name: hwVoIfConfigStatus
hwVoIfConfigStatus.description: This object expresses the status of voice interface.

hwVoIfConfigDtmfThreshold.name: hwVoIfConfigDtmfThreshold
hwVoIfConfigDtmfThreshold.description: This object Set the level threshold of recieve DTMF.

hwVoIfConfigCallingNumSubstRule.name: hwVoIfConfigCallingNumSubstRule
hwVoIfConfigCallingNumSubstRule.description: This object specifies a number-substitute rule that apply calling numbor this subscriber line. It is valid if its value is between 1 and 21474836This subscriber line doesn't apply any number-substitute rule if its value is 0.

hwVoIfConfigCalledNumSubstRule.name: hwVoIfConfigCalledNumSubstRule
hwVoIfConfigCalledNumSubstRule.description: This object specifies a number-substitute rule that apply called number for this subscriber line. It is valid if its value is between 1 and 2147483647. This subscriber line doesn't apply any number-substitute rule if its value is 0.
